questions.question: Which of the following is a tribasic acid?

explanations.a: Acetic acid is monobasic, as it has only one replaceable hydrogen.
explanations.b: Phosphoric acid is tribasic because it has three replaceable hydrogen atoms.

questions.question: In the equation, A = εlc, what quantity is represented by ε?

explanations.a: Incorrect – Absorbitivity is not a standard term here.
explanations.b: Incorrect – Path length is represented by 'l'.
explanations.c: Correct – ε is the molar absorptivity (or molar extinction coefficient).
explanations.d: Incorrect – Wavelength is not represented by ε.

questions.question: Theoretically, a reducing agent can be described as a substance that

explanations.a: Incorrect – Losing electrons means oxidation, not reduction.
explanations.b: Correct – A reducing agent loses electrons and reduces another substance.
explanations.c: Incorrect – This describes an oxidizing agent.
explanations.d: Incorrect – This describes a reduced substance, not a reducing agent.

questions.question: The visible portion of the electromagnetic spectrum occurs between ……nm and ……nm

explanations.a: Incorrect – This range is in the infrared region.
explanations.b: Incorrect – This is ultraviolet to X-ray region.
explanations.c: Correct – The visible light spectrum spans approximately from 400 to 740 nm.
explanations.d: Incorrect – This range is in the extreme UV to X-ray range.
